amendment.description: Amendment transfers $2 million out of the Department of Energy's Administrative account and moves it to the construction budget of the Army Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase coastal restoration construction by $2,000,000 within the Department of Army-Corps of Engineers, and reduce the administration account within the Department of Energy by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Scalise.
